verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H94>Agur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3348>Jakeh,<s%> the <S%H4853>oracle:<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> to <S%H384>Ithiel,<s%> to <S%H384>Ithiel<s%> and <S%H401>Ucal:<s%>
"Surely I am the most <S%H1198>ignorant<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H376>don't<s%> have a man's <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
I have not <S%H3925>learned<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> neither do I <S%H3045>have<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One.<s%>

Who has ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3381>descended?<s%> Who has <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> in his <S%H2651>fists?<s%> Who has <S%H6887>bound<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in his <S%H8071>garment?<s%> Who has <S%H6965>established<s%> all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%> What is his <S%H8034>name,<s%> and what is his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H8034>name,<s%> if you <S%H3045>know?<s%>
"Every <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H6884>flawless.<s%> He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to those who take refuge in <S%H2620>him.<s%>
<S%H3254>Don't<s%> you add to his <S%H1697>words,<s%> lest he <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H3576>you,<s%> and you be found a liar.
<S%H8147>"Two<s%> things I have <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H4513>you;<s%> don't deny me before I <S%H4191>die:<s%>

Remove <S%H7368>far<s%> from me <S%H7723>falsehood<s%> and <S%H1697>lies.<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me neither <S%H7389>poverty<s%> nor <S%H6239>riches.<s%> <S%H2963>Feed<s%> me with the <S%H3899>food<s%> that is needful for <S%H2706>me;<s%>

lest I be <S%H7646>full,<s%> <S%H3584>deny<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> and say, <S%H3068><s%> 'Who is Yahweh?' or lest I be <S%H3423>poor,<s%> and <S%H1589>steal,<s%> and so <S%H8610>dishonor<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H3960>"Don't<s%> slander a <S%H5650>servant<s%> to his <S%H113>master,<s%> lest he <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H816>you,<s%> and you be held guilty.
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that <S%H7043>curses<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H1288>doesn't<s%> bless their <S%H517>mother.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that is <S%H2889>pure<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> yet are not <S%H7364>washed<s%> from their <S%H6675>filthiness.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation,<s%> oh how <S%H7311>lofty<s%> are their <S%H5869>eyes!<s%> Their <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> are lifted <S%H5375>up.<s%>

There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are like <S%H2719>swords,<s%> and their <S%H4973>jaws<s%> like <S%H3979>knives,<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> from among <S%H120>men.<s%>

"The <S%H5936>leach<s%> has <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> <S%H3051><s%> 'Give, <S%H3051>give.<s%>' "There are <S%H7969>three<s%> things that are never <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H559>that<s%> <S%H1952>don't<s%> say, 'Enough:'

<S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> the <S%H6115>barren<s%> <S%H7356>womb;<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H4325>water;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H559>doesn't<s%> say, <S%H1952><s%> 'Enough.'

"The <S%H5869>eye<s%> that <S%H3932>mocks<s%> at his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H936>scorns<s%> <S%H3349>obedience<s%> to his <S%H517>mother:<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall pick it <S%H5365>out,<s%> the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H5404>eagles<s%> shall eat <S%H398>it.<s%>
"There are <S%H7969>three<s%> things which are too <S%H6381>amazing<s%> for <S%H702>me,<s%> four which I <S%H3045>don't<s%> understand:

The <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> in the <S%H8064>air;<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> on a <S%H6697>rock;<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H591>ship<s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> with a <S%H5959>maiden.<s%>

"So is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5003>adulterous<s%> <S%H802>woman:<s%> she <S%H398>eats<s%> and <S%H4229>wipes<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H6466><s%> 'I have done nothing <S%H205>wrong.<s%>'
"For <S%H7969>three<s%> things the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> and under <S%H702>four,<s%> it <S%H3201>can't<s%> bear <S%H5375>up:<s%>
For a <S%H5650>servant<s%> when he is <S%H4427>king;<s%> a <S%H5036>fool<s%> when he is <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>food;<s%>
for an <S%H8130>unloved<s%> woman when she is <S%H1166>married;<s%> and a <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> who is <S%H3423>heir<s%> to her <S%H1404>mistress.<s%>
"There are <S%H702>four<s%> things which are <S%H6996>little<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> but they are <S%H2449>exceedingly<s%> <S%H2450>wise:<s%>
the <S%H5244>ants<s%> are not a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> yet they <S%H3559>provide<s%> their <S%H3899>food<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer.<s%>
The <S%H8227>conies<s%> are but a <S%H6099>feeble<s%> <S%H5971>folk,<s%> yet <S%H7760>make<s%> they their <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5553>rocks.<s%>
The <S%H697>locusts<s%> have no <S%H4428>king,<s%> yet they <S%H3318>advance<s%> in <S%H2686>ranks.<s%>
You can <S%H8610>catch<s%> a <S%H8079>lizard<s%> with your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> yet it is in <S%H4428>kings<s%>' <S%H1964>palaces.<s%>
"There are <S%H7969>three<s%> things which are <S%H3190>stately<s%> in their <S%H6806>march,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> which are <S%H2895>stately<s%> in <S%H3212>going:<s%>
The <S%H3918>lion,<s%> which is <S%H1368>mightiest<s%> among <S%H929>animals,<s%> and <S%H7725>doesn't<s%> turn away for <S%H6440>any;<s%>
the <S%H4975>greyhound,<s%> the male <S%H8495>goat<s%> <S%H176>also;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> against whom there is no rising <S%H510>up.<s%>
"If you have done <S%H5034>foolishly<s%> in lifting <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H2161>yourself,<s%> or if you have thought evil, put your <S%H3027>hand<s%> over your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For as the <S%H4330>churning<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2529>butter,<s%> and the <S%H4330>wringing<s%> of the <S%H639>nose<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> so the <S%H4330>forcing<s%> of <S%H639>wrath<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7379>strife.<s%>"
